mapper.select: SELECT P.PKG_ID, P.PKG_NM, P.DRL_NM, P.DRL_SOURCE, P.DIALECT, P.PATH, P.REG_USRID, M.MEMBER_NAME REG_USRNM, DATE_FORMAT(P.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, PKG_DSC, DATE_FORMAT(P.UDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS UDT_DT, P.UDT_USRID, M1.MEMBER_NAME UDT_USRNM FROM targetai.PKG P LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (P.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M1 ON (P.UDT_USRID = M1.MEMBER_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND PKG_ID = #{pkgId_search} AND PKG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pkgNm_search}, '%') AND REG_USRID = #{pkgRegUsrId_search} ORDER BY PKG_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM targetai.PKG WHERE 1=1 AND PKG_ID = #{pkgId_search} AND PKG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pkgNm_search}, '%') AND REG_USRID = #{pkgRegUsrId_search}

SELECT P.PKG_ID, P.PKG_NM, P.DRL_NM, P.DRL_SOURCE, P.DIALECT, P.PATH, P.REG_USRID, M.MEMBER_NAME REG_USRNM, DATE_FORMAT(P.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, P.PKG_DSC, DATE_FORMAT(UDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS UDT_DT, P.UDT_USRID, M1.MEMBER_NAME UDT_USRNM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE WHERE PKG_ID = P.PKG_ID) AS RULE_COUNT_IN_PKG FROM targetai.PKG P LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (P.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M1 ON (P.UDT_USRID = M1.MEMBER_ID) WHERE PKG_ID = #{pkgId}
